quote: She had maintained her strength in the face of all this for so long that we had come to take it for granted, but she wasn't bulletproof. She might've been peculiar but she was also human,
quote_letters: SHE HAD MAINTAINED HER STRENGTH IN THE FACE OF ALL THIS FOR SO LONG THAT WE HAD COME TO TAKE IT FOR GRANTED BUT SHE WASNT BULLETPROOF SHE MIGHTVE BEEN PECULIAR BUT SHE WAS ALSO HUMAN
